name: pigs in a blanket
instructions: 2. Unroll the crescent roll dough and separate it into triangles.
3. Place one cocktail sausage at the wide end of each triangle.
4. Roll the dough tightly around the sausage, making sure to seal the edges.
5. Repeat steps 3 and 4 for the remaining sausages.
6. Place the wrapped sausages on a baking sheet, leaving a little space between each one.
7. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the dough turns golden brown and crispy.
8. Remove from the oven, allow them to cool slightly, and serve.
description: Pigs in a Blanket are mini sausages wrapped in a flaky crescent roll dough. This classic appetizer is easy to make and perfect for parties or a quick snack.
